code:
-spec min_changes(S :: unicode:unicode_binary()) -> integer().
min_changes(S) ->
    B = binary:bin_to_list(S),
    CountChanges = fun
        (Char, {Prev, Changes}) when Char =:= Prev ->
            {Char, Changes};
        (_, {_, Changes}) ->
            {_, Changes + 1}
    end,
    {_, MinChanges} = lists:foldl(CountChanges, {hd(B), 0}, tl(B)),
    MinChanges div 2.
